alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson; Leon; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 5:26PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jefferson, southeastern Leon, northern Madison, southeastern Cook, south central Berrien, Lanier, Lowndes and southern Brooks Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 526 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ray City to 8 miles southeast of Quitman to near Monticello to near Florida A and M. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Monticello, Florida State University, Tallahassee Community College, Valdosta, Lake Park, Florida A and M, Lakeland, Madison, Hahira, Ray City, Moody Air Force Base, Doak Campbell Stadium, Remerton, Meigs, Dasher, Greenville, Cody, Barretts and Tallahassee Memorial Hosp. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
